h2_title: Where to Find the Daoist Mi
content: The Daoist Mi is an initially non-hostile NPC that is found while exploring the secret area in Purple Cloud Mountain -- which you can activate by defeating the Venom Daoist twice both in the Webbed Hollow and Temple of Yellow Flowers.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Daoist_Mi.md', within the main section titled 'Daoist Mi', specifically from the subsection 'Where to Find the Daoist Mi'.
The content is as follows:
The Daoist Mi is an initially non-hostile NPC that is found while exploring the secret area in Purple Cloud Mountain -- which you can activate by defeating the Venom Daoist twice both in the Webbed Hollow and Temple of Yellow Flowers.
